result.eng: The radio broadcasts all over the country.

result.eng: How good is the country's bus network?

result.eng: He made a sacrifice for the country.
result.ga: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíre

result.eng: The country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.
result.ga: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháil
result.orig: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháil

result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig aos litearṫa na tíre le ċéile ag an ċoṁḋáilThe country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.

result.eng: He came to the country in June 1922.
result.ga: Tháinig sé chun na tíre i Meitheamh 1922
result.orig: Tháinig sé chun na tíre i Meitheamh 1922

result.eng: The Irish language is intertwined with the history of the country.
result.ga: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíre
result.orig: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíre

result.eng: The country's economy is in shambles.
result.ga: Tá geilleagar na tíre ina phraiseach
result.orig: Tá geilleagar na tíre ina phraiseach
result.html: Tá geilleagar na tíre ina phraiseachThe country's economy is in shambles.
result.ponchtml: Tá geilleagar na tíre ina ṗraiseaċThe country's economy is in shambles.

result.eng: I'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.
result.ga: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaim
result.orig: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaim
result.html: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaimI'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé tuirseaċ den áit agus tá malairt dreaċ tíre ag teastáil uaimI'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.

result.eng: The reason for that is that it was out in the country.
result.ga: An t-údar leis sin ná go raibh sé amuigh i dtuath na tíre
result.orig: An t-údar leis sin ná go raibh sé amuigh i dtuath na tíre

result.ponchtml: An t-údar leis sin ná go raiḃ sé amuiġ i dtuaṫ na tíreThe reason for that is that it was out in the country.

result.eng: The country's civilization and civilization were falling apart.
result.ga: Bhí sibhialtacht agus cultúr na tíre ag titim as a chéile

result.html: Bhí sibhialtacht agus cultúr na tíre ag titim as a chéileThe country's civilization and civilization were falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siḃialtaċt agus cultúr na tíre ag titim as a ċéileThe country's civilization and civilization were falling apart.

result.eng: Five spies were based around the country under false names.
result.ga: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréige
result.orig: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréige
result.html: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréigeFive spies were based around the country under false names.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúigear spiairí lonnaiṫe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneaċa bréigeFive spies were based around the country under false names.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: All airports in the country were closed.
result.html: Dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.
result.ponchtml: Dúnaḋ aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.

result.eng: People started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ga: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.orig: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.html: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.

result.eng: Most of the country's businesses are in private ownership.
result.ga: Tá an chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí na tíre i seilbh phríobháideach
result.orig: Tá an chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí na tíre i seilbh phríobháideach

result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó de ġnólaċtaí na tíre i seilḃ ṗríoḃáideaċMost of the country's businesses are in private ownership.

result.eng: In 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ga: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma

result.ponchtml: In 1856 rialaiġ Cúirt Uaċtaraċ na Stát Aontaiṫe nár ḃain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
